algorithms

Class AStar

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithms.ShortestPath
      • algorithms.AStar

  • public class AStar
extends ShortestPath
    AStar algorithm calculates the shortest path to a specific node in a graph.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AStar(int[][] graph, int[] distanceEstimate, int goal)
      AStar algorithm calculates the shortest path to a specific node in a graph.

    • Method Summary

      Method calculates the shortest path from starting node to goal.

      Method converts the graph to an adjacency list.

      Method returns the shortest distance to the given node.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AStar

        public AStar(int[][] graph,
             int[] distanceEstimate,
             int goal)
        AStar algorithm calculates the shortest path to a specific node in a graph.
        Parameters:
        graph - the Graph in the form of a two-dimensional array.
        distanceEstimate - An array containing distance estimates between the goal and every other node. The algorithm only finds the shortest path if no distances are over-estimated.
        goal - The index of the goal node.

    • Method Detail

      • convertGraph

        protected void convertGraph(int[][] graph)
        Method converts the graph to an adjacency list.
        Specified by:
        convertGraph in class ShortestPath
        Parameters:
        graph - the original graph in the form of a two-dimensional array

      • calculateShortestPath

        public void calculateShortestPath()
        Method calculates the shortest path from starting node to goal.
        Specified by:
        calculateShortestPath in class ShortestPath

      • getShortestPath

        public java.lang.String getShortestPath(int node)
                                 throws java.lang.Throwable
        Method returns the shortest path from starting node to the given node.
        Overrides:
        getShortestPath in class ShortestPath
        Parameters:
        node - the index of the goal node
        Returns:
        a String describing the path or informing if it has not been found.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Throwable

      • getDistanceTo

        public int getDistanceTo(int node)
        Method returns the shortest distance to the given node.
        Overrides:
        getDistanceTo in class ShortestPath
        Parameters:
        node - the index of the goal node
        Returns:
        the length of the path, -2 if there is no path to the node and -1 if the node was not yet searched

      • search

        public void search(int node,
                   int[] distanceEstimate)
        Method makes another search for the shortest path to the given node.
        Parameters:
        node - The index of the goal node.
        distanceEstimate - An array containing distance estimates between the goal and every other node.
